name: Dash Parry
description:
Made for the Mini Jam Boss Rush game jam. Made using Game Maker Studio 1.4

Game Jam Theme: Boss Rush                                                                                                                  Game Jam Limitation: No WASD or Arrow Keys

Controls:

Aim With Mouse

Left Click to Dash-Parry (hold to charge)

Right Click to Move (only on PC)

Dash into flashing bullets to parry them and recover a small amount of health. Fully Charged Dashes perform much more powerful parries.
